title: Micheál Martin becomes Irish prime minister for second time | ...
snippet: The Fianna Fáil leader served as Taoiseach during 2020-2022, and will again rotate the job with coalition partner Fine Gael.

title: Tactician, political survivor - who is Micheál Martin?
snippet: Under the 2020 deal with Fine Gael, Mr Martin became taoiseach for the first two-and-a-half years of the new coalition, from summer 2020 until December 2022, at which point he would be replaced by Fine Gael's Leo Varadkar.

title: Micheál Martin – Houses of the Oireachtas
snippet: Brexit Issues 22. Deputy Micheál Martin asked the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade if he has spoken with his other EU counterparts recently regarding Brexit.
